1) The customer base of Heroes of Pymoli is mostly male at 84% of total players. Female players only represent 14% of their customer base but they spend more per item ($3.20 vs. $3.02).
2) Heroes of Pymoli is most appealing to the 20-24 age bracket at 45% of total players. 77% of the total players are between the ages of 15 to 29 years old.
3) Most popular items to purchase are "Final Critic" with a purchase count of 13 & "Oathbreaker, Last Hope of the Breaking Storm" with a purchase count of 12.
